short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace fonts for Malayalam text on specified domains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In windows, the default malayalam font is not rendered correctly. To resolve that we can use better malayalam font where a user can change default malayalam font to noto serif malayalam or anek malayalam.
